item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:63 Chances: Plug Power installed its first system at Amazon.com that will produce hydrogen fuel for forklift trucks at a fulfillment center in Aurora, Colo. Hydrogen generated on site in Colorado will power forklift trucks and help lower emissions. The company completed the installation and commissioning of an electrolyzer system at an Amazon fulfillment center in Colorado.
